books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist celebrates Jefferson’s skills as a practical politician.
books.name: THOMAS JEFFERSON

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden, by a former member of the Navy SEALs.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Greg Gutfeld
books.description: The Fox News Channel host denounces liberal double standards and intolerance masquerading as tolerance.
books.name: JOY OF HATE

books.author: by Cathy Glass
books.description: An account, first published in 2007, of a foster mother who tries to save a violent and aggressive 8-year-old girl whose parents were involved in a pedophile ring.
books.name: DAMAGED

books.author: by Nate Silver
books.description: An examination of predictions, the ones that come true and the ones that don’t.
books.name: THE SIGNAL AND THE NOISE

books.author: by Ray Kurzweil
books.description: A new theory of how the thinking part of the brain works can help us create more intelligent machines.
books.name: HOW TO CREATE A MIND

books.author: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: The political genius of Abraham Lincoln, revealed in his relationship with his cabinet; originally published in 2005.
books.name: TEAM OF RIVALS

books.author: by Susannah Cahalan
books.description: A medical mystery in which doctors struggle to discover why a young reporter suddenly experiences seizures, hallucinations and eventually near catatonia.
books.name: BRAIN ON FIRE

books.author: by Jake Tapper
books.description: The story of a deadly Taliban attack on a remote American outpost in Afghanistan in 2009 sheds light on the war.
books.name: THE OUTPOST

books.author: by Andrew Solomon
books.description: The difficulties and triumphs of families dealing with exceptional children.
books.name: FAR FROM THE TREE

books.author: by William Manchester and Paul Reid
books.description: A biography of Winston Churchill, reaching from World War II until his death in 1965.
books.name: LAST LION

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN
